sentences.en: Hull construction's materials & scantling designs are to be complied with the rules of Classification Society.
sentences.cn: 船体结构的材料 及 构件尺寸设计应满足船级社规范要求.

sentences.en: Scantling of plates and sections will be in accordance with rules requirements and Builder's practice.
sentences.cn: 一些板和部件的结构尺寸必须根据规范要求和建造者的惯例.

words.tran_cn: 少量；[木]小块木材；[船]材料尺寸
